name: Emily Zhang
persona: Emily Zhang is a dedicated Biochemistry major in her third year at university. She is highly motivated to achieve strong grades and puts consistent effort into her studies, balancing coursework and lab work effectively. While she occasionally feels anxious before big exams, her perseverance and strong self-discipline help her manage stress and stay on track. Emily is organized and reliable, often helping classmates and seeking out research opportunities to further her academic goals.
